column2: The Finnish telecom company sets a new long-term target for operating margins of at least 14%, replacing its earlier 2023 target of between 11% and 13%.
column4: Nokia Reinstates Dividend, Sets New, Long-Term Margins Target

column2: Shares in Facebook's parent are on track for their worst day ever. While many are selling, at least one fund manager is talking about buying the dip.
column4: Meta Stock Gets Hammered. But Here’s the Argument for Buying the Big Drop.
